name: Bast's Blessing
description:
Here's the story:

After one hundred years, you are the only one brave enough to go outside in order to save humanity.  Will you be able to find where you're going? Do you receive Bast's Blessing?

Game Play:

If on a computer please use the arrow keys to move around. 

If on a mobile device swipe the screen in the direction you would like to go.

To talk to NPC's, bump into them using the prescribed methods above.

Note: I wanted to make a scene where you anticipated a grand adventure. Please let me know if I succeeded, or not. All feedback is welcome.
